question: The First World War started with a railroad attack in Berlin.
The snowy owl’s legs are covered with feathers.
Four American presidents have been assassinated.
The end of the First World War and the attack on the World Trade Center both took place on September 11.
The Buffalo Bills hold the unfortunate record of 4 consecutive losses at the Super Bowl.
After having won all their games in the 2007 regular season, the New England Patriots won the Super Bowl in 2008.
Michael Phelps’ 28 Olympic medals are all gold medals.
Bo Jackson was selected for the Major League Baseball All-Star Game and the American Football League All-Star Game.
The colors of a rainbow always appear in the same order.
Adult humans and adult dogs have the same number of teeth.
